metadata.name: VaynerSports Pass #1
metadata.description: The VaynerSports Pass is a premier utility-first sports NFT project providing more ways for fans to meaningfully connect and form closer bonds with athletes and unlock access to world renowned events and once in a lifetime experiences. Designed for NFT and sports fans alike, the pass provides its owners with unrivaled utility, collectability, and continued value through partner project mints which holders will be able to mint for the price of gas alone.
